name: Sapiens
description:
"Sapiens" exhibits one of the most powerful tools of our species - our hand. It allowed us to accomplish everything that permeates our minds; from the taste of chocolate to stepping on the Moon.

The background of this painting carries some of these marvelous triumphs of ours. From the original written steps for the Apollo 11 mission to the formula that gave insight to how the misterious black holes are formed; and from the chemical composition of chocolate to the address of our Solar System in relation to pulsars inside the Milky Way galaxy, the writings, drawings and equations in "Sapiens" all connect and represent the unimaginable capacity of the Homo sapiens.

6000 x 8000
